Reviews.Title: “Very basic but worth every penny(euro!)”
Reviews.Author: Leiona
Reviews.Content: city center metro stop 1 uphill morning downhill home days sightseeing gardens spectacular relaxing alot simple adequate didn´t late sightseeing morning bed shower staff friendly helpfull breakfast simple considering price hotel hostel can´t complain don´t forget earplugs you´re light sleeper

Reviews.Title: “Very plain and simple, but great price and very clean”
Reviews.Author: MartaPalomares
Reviews.Content: residence excellent rates people reception residence centre tube station near dont expect frills soap ensuite tv bed wooden table chair read walk barcelona wonderful views please choose top floor offer meals price filling plentiful rations service luxuries budget accommodation

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: happyguest200
Reviews.Content: stay barcelona subway station relatively close location agree maybe didnt complaints breakfast lunch dinner included wine served huge jugs surprised hotel nice courtyard spend outside meals served specific times late miss food eat

Reviews.Title: “Only good if you like hostel style accomodation.”
Reviews.Author: Enicomb
Reviews.Content: stayed night intended stay barcelona left soon hotel bad believe student halls poor students youre inside feels neglected school stayed person third bed actually corridor shoddy wooden wall separating public walkway complete moulding pipes bed barren beds camp beds squeak loudly sleep sleep door walls paper thin expect nights sleep bathroom unbelievably dirty drain smells awful shower door mouldy shut top signposted outside exactly recommend bother walk metro station receptionist directions tell maps sale metro city except slum hotel located cheap apparently barcelona grand scheme isnt paid night people paid 20euros madrid received standard accommodation hotel stars stay

Reviews.Title: “Unbeatable value”
Reviews.Author: oxenholme
Reviews.Content: hotel based roughly 15 min train journey centre town wont win prizes looking luxurious hotel barcelona looking value disappointed pros 1 price total cost £25 person night spoke people staying youth hostel paying save money staying 2 breakfast included happy day buffet croissants bread selection fillings coffee machine bottles water 3 location 5 min walk station 10 min walk supermarket 4 customer service staff friendly spoke grasp english language rarity barcelona example towels delivered hours cons 1 air conditioning reaches night barcelona imagine lack air conditioning major disappointment arrived hotel sleeping difficult nights adapted temperatures 2 location hotel walking distance train daily barcelona cost €140 journey buy 10 journeys €8 3 luxuries price didnt expect swimming pool fountain turtles swimming overall score 7510
